message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to purchase this exceptional product. Given its value and potential, I believe a starting price of $1,450,000 is fair. This is a unique opportunity to acquire something truly special.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget allows me to only pay up to $1,350,000. I hope we can find a mutually beneficial solution.
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I've tried to find a middle ground here. How about we settle on $1,400,000? This reflects my best effort to make this work for both of us.

Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I understand the value of the product and am willing to consider $1,380,000 as a counterproposal. I hope this brings us closer to a mutually agreeable solution.
Bob, I appreciate you meeting me part of the way.  I'm willing to come down slightly more to $1,390,000.  I believe this is a fair compromise that reflects the true value of this product.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your continued efforts to reach an agreement. I am willing to consider $1,375,000 as a counterproposal. I hope this brings us closer to closing the deal.
